name: rebottle
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to put something back into its bottle, or into a different bottle: After frying the potatoes, strain and rebottle the oil for future use. It was not possible to resell or re-bottle the drinks once they were served.
More examplesFewer examplesMembers of the industry are not permitted to bottle or rebottle distilled spirits.Boil the liquid, then re-bottle.This notice must appear on rebottled and repacked products.They rebottled the sparkling wine with fake labels saying it was expensive champagne.
